Cédric Beust ♔ wrote:
> Integration and unit tests are actually not mutually exclusive with fast and
> slow tests.  Here is an example:

<snip />
> @Test(groups = {"fast", "integration"})
> public void tableShouldExist() {
>   // verify that a table exists
> }

I wouldn't classify this test as fast, because it probably takes longer
than 0.1 s to execute.

I completely agree that without some kind of annotation, we can't have 
tests belonging to multiple categories. I've just never wanted that 
feature, that's all.
